mapper.select: SELECT e.express_code , e.express_state , g.name AS goods_name , g.img AS goods_images ,ug.id AS goods_id , p.pawn_ticket_code FROM p_express e LEFT JOIN p_goods g ON e.fid = g.id AND e.type IN (4,5,6) LEFT JOIN p_user_goods ug ON g.goods_id = ug.id LEFT JOIN p_user_pawn p ON ug.id = p.goods_id AND p.pawn_ticket_code IS NOT NULL AND p.org_id = #{orgId} WHERE g.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' UNION SELECT e.express_code , e.express_state , ug.name AS goods_name , ug.images AS goods_images , ug.id AS goods_id , p.pawn_ticket_code FROM p_express e LEFT JOIN p_user_goods ug ON ug.id = e.fid AND e.type IN (4,5,6) LEFT JOIN p_user_pawn p ON ug.id = p.goods_id AND p.pawn_ticket_code IS NOT NULL AND p.org_id = #{orgId} WHERE ug.name LIKE '%${keyword}%'

select A.*, B.images as goods_images, B.name as goods_name from p_express A left join p_user_goods B on A.fid = B.id where A.source_id = #{source_id}
and B.post_state != 1 and A.type = 1
and B.back_state != 0 and A.type = 2
order by A.create_time desc

update p_express set source = #{source}, express_name = #{expressName}, express_code = #{expressCode}, express_state = #{expressState}, post_name = #{postName}, post_phone = #{postPhone}, receive_name = #{receiveName}, receive_phone = #{receivePhone}, recevice_address = #{receviceAddress}, modify_time = null
where id = #{id}
